meanings.definition: Regard with respect or warm approval.
meanings.sent1: She was admiring the beautiful painting in the museum.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy admiring the talent of skilled artists.
meanings.sent3: While admiring the sunset, she accidentally bumped into a pole.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were admiring the intricate details of the sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The crowd was admiring the bravery of the young firefighter.

meanings.sent1: He was admiring the cute puppies playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: People often spend time admiring the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: While admiring the view, she tripped over a rock.
meanings.sent4: The child was admiring the colorful balloons floating in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Tourists were admiring the historic architecture of the city.

meanings.definition: To regard with wonder, pleasure, or approval.
meanings.sent1: The audience was admiring the talented performers on stage.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but admiring the stunning sunset over the ocean.
meanings.sent3: While admiring the flowers, she accidentally stepped on a bee.
meanings.sent4: The little girl was admiring the twinkling stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The explorer was admiring the breathtaking view from the mountain peak.
